summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley between Tracts 108 & 109, The Pacific Coast Addition, being the aley between 33rd Ave. East and 34th Ave. East from East Thomas to East Harrison St.; and certain other alleys and a street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 19646 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
